verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%>. O sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%>; for he hath done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> marvellous things <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%>: his right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and his holy <S%H6944><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, hath gotten him the victory <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> hath made known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his salvation <S%H3444><s%>: his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> hath he openly shewed <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8765><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>.

He hath remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his mercy <S%H2617><s%> and his truth <S%H530><s%> toward the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: all the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, all the earth <S%H776><s%>: make a loud noise <S%H6476><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and rejoice <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8761><s%>, and sing <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8761><s%> praise.
Sing <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> with the harp <S%H3658><s%>; with the harp <S%H3658><s%>, and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of a psalm <S%H2172><s%>.
With shofars <S%H2689><s%> and sound <S%H6963><s%> of cornet <S%H7782><s%> make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8685><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, the King <S%H4428><s%>.
Let the sea <S%H3220><s%> roar <S%H7481><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and the fulness <S%H4393><s%> thereof; the world <S%H8398><s%>, and they that dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> therein.
Let the floods <S%H5104><s%> clap <S%H4222><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their hands <S%H3709><s%>: let the hills <S%H2022><s%> be joyful <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8762><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>

Before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; for he cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>: with righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shall he judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%> with equity <S%H4339><s%>.
